name: Legacy Affiliate Dashboard v1
description: The original affiliate dashboard that served our partners for 5 years. Replaced by the new unified dashboard with improved analytics and user experience.

name: Old Content Management System
description: Legacy CMS used for managing website content across multiple brands. Migrated to a more modern, headless CMS solution.

name: Mobile App Analytics Tool
description: Internal mobile analytics tracking tool. Functionality merged into our unified analytics platform.

name: Beta Testing Platform
description: Internal beta testing platform for new features. Replaced by integrated testing workflows in our main development pipeline.

name: Legacy API Gateway v2
description: Second generation API gateway that served internal services. Upgraded to v3 with better performance and security features.
